parrot.tip: with Parrot you can generate reports from ontologies expressed in multiple formats (RDF/XML, N3, RDFa).
with Parrot you can generate reports from rule documents expressed in multiple formats (RIF/XML and RIF PS).
Parrot report offers two places (prologue and appendix) where add XHTML content to improve it.
you can find out about items supported by Parrot on a help page.
with Parrot you can generate a report uploading a file.
with Parrot you can generate a report entering directly the markup.
Parrot embeds RDFa in the generated reports.
